dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.yk2m25
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Pontia occidentalis (Reakirt, 1866)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 3 records from Museum of Southwestern Biology, Division of Arthropods 285 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 101 records from Royal British Columbia Museum Entomology Collection 4 records from J. B. Wallis / R. E. Roughley Museum of Entomology 1 records from State of Vermont Forest Biology Lab 2 records from NABU|naturgucker 6 records from Arizona State University Hasbrouck Insect Collection 1 records from New Mexico State Collection of Arthropods 2 records from Stuart M. Fullerton Collection of Arthropods (UCFC), University of Central Florida 7 records from First record in Quebec for the western white, Pontia occidentalis (Reakirt) (Lepidoptera: Pieridae, Pierinae) 7 records from Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Saskatoon 161 records from William F. Barr Entomological Museum 6 records from Denver Museum of Nature & Science - Entomology 37 records from BugGuide - Identification, Images, & Information For Insects, Spiders & Their Kin For the United States & Canada 235 records from C.P. Gillette Museum of Arthropod Diversity 12 records from R. M. Bohart Museum of Entomology 9 records from University of Nevada, Reno, Museum of Natural History, Entomology Research Collection 52 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 6 records from UAM Insect Observations (Arctos) 7 records from Ross A. Layberry, Collection 23 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 1 records from Recent Invertebrates Specimens 30 records from University of Minnesota Insect Collection 20 records from Lepidoptera World (Luomus) (LEPW) 1 records from San Diego Natural History Museum Entomology Department 3 records from E.C. Manning Park Collection 2 records from University of Western Ontario Collection 47 records from Butterflies and Skippers of Alberta Project 7 records from RBINS Lepidoptera collection 811 records from KWP Lepidoptera Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Lund University Biological Museum - Insect collections Inventory 51 records from Ross A.
